name.ja: ライゼオル・プラグイン

text.en: Target 1 Xyz Monster or "Raizeol" monster in your GY or banishment; Special Summon it, then you can attach 1 "Raizeol" card from your Deck to 1 Rank 4 Xyz Monster you control as material, also you cannot declare attacks for the rest of this turn, except with Rank 4 Xyz Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Raizeol Plug-In" per turn.
